data.name: Amazon Product - upsells last!
data.description:
The content in the correct order so you can see what you want rather than what amazon wants to sell you.

The product description and important information comes before all the other products you don't actually want.

data.name: Instagram - no login overlay
data.description: To stop the forced login overlay appearing when viewing an instagram page you want to look at

data.name: JuicyAds - Dark Mode
Dark Forum for Deviant Art
data.description: Change the default green forums to match Eclipse Dark Theme.

data.description: A dark theme for Skyblock Forums.

data.name: Google Search Tools Back (Modified By Mozl)

The source code from "https://userstyles.org/styles/95110/google-search-tools-back".

data.name: Trakt TV Dark & ad free
data.description: Dark theme for Trakt.tv. Also hides ads.

data.name: Inoreader Aqua -> Purple
data.description:
To be used with "Aqua" theme of Inoreader.

Header and sidebar recolored into purple.
Using default sans-serif font set in browser for more native appearance on desktop.
